mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : FAQ_BASE.select */ SELECT FAQ_SEQ /* FAQ_SEQ FAQ_순번 int(0,0) */ , FAQ_DIV_CD /* FAQ_DIV_CD FAQ_구분_코드 varchar(10) */ , FAQ_TITL /* FAQ_TITL FAQ_제목 varchar(50) */ , FAQ_Q_TXT /* FAQ_Q_TXT FAQ_질문_내용 mediumtext(16777215) */ , FAQ_RPLY_TXT /* FAQ_RPLY_TXT FAQ_답변_내용 mediumtext(16777215) */ , REG_USER_ID /* REG_USER_ID 등록_사용자_ID varchar(50) */ , REG_DTTM /* REG_DTTM 등록_일시 char(14) */ , UPT_USER_ID /* UPT_USER_ID 수정_사용자_ID varchar(50) */ , UPT_DTTM /* UPT_DTTM 수정_일시 char(14) */ FROM FAQ_BASE WHERE FAQ_SEQ = #{faqSeq} /* FAQ_SEQ FAQ_순번 int(0,0) */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : FAQ_BASE.insert */ INSERT INTO FAQ_BASE ( FAQ_SEQ /* FAQ_SEQ FAQ_순번 int(0,0) */
, FAQ_DIV_CD /* FAQ_DIV_CD FAQ_구분_코드 varchar(10) */
, FAQ_TITL /* FAQ_TITL FAQ_제목 varchar(50) */
, FAQ_Q_TXT /* FAQ_Q_TXT FAQ_질문_내용 mediumtext(16777215) */
, FAQ_RPLY_TXT /* FAQ_RPLY_TXT FAQ_답변_내용 mediumtext(16777215) */
, REG_USER_ID /* REG_USER_ID 등록_사용자_ID varchar(50) */
, REG_DTTM /* REG_DTTM 등록_일시 char(14) */
, UPT_USER_ID /* UPT_USER_ID 수정_사용자_ID varchar(50) */
, UPT_DTTM /* UPT_DTTM 수정_일시 char(14) */ ) VALUES ( #{faqSeq} /* FAQ_SEQ FAQ_순번 int(0,0) */
, #{faqDivCd} /* FAQ_DIV_CD FAQ_구분_코드 varchar(10) */
, #{faqTitl} /* FAQ_TITL FAQ_제목 varchar(50) */
, #{faqQTxt} /* FAQ_Q_TXT FAQ_질문_내용 mediumtext(16777215) */
, #{faqRplyTxt} /* FAQ_RPLY_TXT FAQ_답변_내용 mediumtext(16777215) */
, #{regUserId} /* REG_USER_ID 등록_사용자_ID varchar(50) */
, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /* REG_DTTM 등록_일시 char(14) */
, #{uptUserId} /* UPT_USER_ID 수정_사용자_ID varchar(50) */
, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /* UPT_DTTM 수정_일시 char(14) */ )
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : FAQ_BASE.update */ UPDATE FAQ_BASE
, FAQ_DIV_CD = #{faqDivCd} /* FAQ_DIV_CD FAQ_구분_코드 varchar(10) */
, FAQ_TITL = #{faqTitl} /* FAQ_TITL FAQ_제목 varchar(50) */
, FAQ_Q_TXT = #{faqQTxt} /* FAQ_Q_TXT FAQ_질문_내용 mediumtext(16777215) */
, FAQ_RPLY_TXT = #{faqRplyTxt} /* FAQ_RPLY_TXT FAQ_답변_내용 mediumtext(16777215) */
, UPT_USER_ID = #{uptUserId} /* UPT_USER_ID 수정_사용자_ID varchar(50) */
, UPT_DTTM = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /* UPT_DTTM 수정_일시 char(14) */
WHERE FAQ_SEQ = #{faqSeq} /* FAQ_SEQ FAQ_순번 int(0,0) */
